Sexual Purity

We partner with local churches and communities, encouraging young people to dedicate their lives to sexual purity through programs like Silver Ring Thing.

Orphanage

Mama Cooper is an incredible woman of God who takes in children without homes. We support her incredible orphanage in Liberia.
